snippet: Wall Street endured losses as investors worried about the tax increases and spending cuts looming in the United States and as Europe delayed $40 billion in aid for Greece.
abstract: Wall Street endures losses as investors worry about tax increases and spending cuts looming in the United States, and as Europe delays $40 billion in aid for Greece.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street endured losses as investors worried about the tax increases and spending cuts looming in the United States and as Europe delayed $40 billion in aid for Greece.

headline.seo: Stocks Decline on Fiscal Concerns in U.S. and Europe
headline.main: Shares Decline on Fiscal Concerns In the U.S. and Europe
headline.print_headline: Shares Decline on Fiscal Concerns In the U.S. and Europe
